title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Catastrophe for Conor Benn
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Catastrophe for Conor Benn
description:
Joining Mannix this week are DAZN broadcaster Ade Oladipo and former junior middleweight champion Sergio Mora. Mannix, Oladipo and Mora discuss Conor Benn flunking a drug test, what it means for Benn, if the promoters were right to call of the fight and more; later, Chris Algieri, who was knocked out by Benn last year, discusses how he felt when he heard the news; finally, Devin Haney on what should happen to Benn plus how he is preparing for his rematch with George Kambosos Jr. #Volume #Colincowherd #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
